description:
This small light cannon burns brightly and fires out an awesome 1700 lumens in turbo mode. Updated with a more focused beam that throws light further than ever. Dual switches give you the flexibility of momentary activation from the tail-cap, or more conventional activation from the side. Compatibility with a single rechargeable 18650 (included) or 2 CR123A batteries gives you options on the grid, or off.

  • 6 lighting modes: 5 lumens (230h), 50 lumens (26.5h), 150 lumens (8.5h), 600 lumens (2.5h), 1700 lumen turbo (1.5h – only useable for 3 minutes at a time due to heat buildup) and 1700 lumen strobe
  • Updated LED offers a more powerful, more focused beam that throws light further in every mode
  • Works with 1 rechargeable 18650 battery or 2 CR123A batteries, giving you convenient power options when travelling or stocking your emergency kit
  • Rugged aluminum body has type-III hard anodizing for an extra level of protection
  • Glass lens is toughened for durability and has anti-reflective coating
  • Momentary activation available from the tail-cap switch. Side-mounted switch cycles through modes
  • LED power indicator on the side-mounted switch lets you know when it's time to replace or charge your battery
  • Regulated output maintains constant brightness throughout battery life
  • In the box: PD35 v.3, ARB-L18 18650 battery, holster, lanyard, spare O-ring, user manual and warranty card
name: Fenix PD35 V3.0 Flashlight
